anya-e0903n1:3: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena nidānavaggasaṁyutte paṭhamaṁ saṁgītaṁ paṭiccasamuppādasuttaṁ kattha taṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:4_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante pañcasate janapadavāsino bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:4_1: Pañcasatā bhante janapadavāsino bhikkhū sabbe ugghāṭitaññuno dhutaṅgadharā āraddhavīriyā
anya-e0903n1:4_2: yuttayogā vipassakā saṇhaṁ sukhumaṁ suññataṁ paccayākāradhammadesanaṁ patthayamānā
anya-e0903n1:4_3: bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā bhagavantaṁ parivāretvā nisīdiṁsu. Tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ ‘‘paṭiccasamuppādaṁ
anya-e0903n1:4_4: vo bhikkhave desessāmi, taṁ suṇātha sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī’’ti evamādinā
anya-e0903n1:5_0: Katamo ca bhikkhave paṭiccasamuppādo. Avijjāpaccayā bhikkhave saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā
anya-e0903n1:5_2: evametassa kevalassa dukkhandhassa samudayo hoti. Ayaṁ vuccati bhikkhave paṭiccasamuppādo.
anya-e0903n1:6_0: Avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodho saṅkhāranirodho (peyyāla) jātinirodhā jarāmaraṇaṁ
anya-e0903n1:6_1: sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā nirujjhanti, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti –
anya-e0903n1:8: Pucchā – tatthāvuso dutiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ vibhaṅgasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:9_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante pañcasate janapadavāsino vipañcitaññuno bhikkhū ārabbha
anya-e0903n1:9_1: bhāsitaṁ. Pañcasatā bhante janapadavāsikā bhikkhū vipañcitaññuno dhutaṅgadharā āraddhavīriyā
anya-e0903n1:9_2: yuttayogā vissakā saṇhaṁ sukhumaṁ suññatapaṭisaṁyuttaṁ paccayākāradhammadesanaṁ patthayamānā
anya-e0903n1:9_3: bhagavantaṁ parivāretvā nisīdiṁsu. Tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ ‘‘paṭicca samuppādaṁ vo bhikkhave
anya-e0903n1:9_4: dedessāmi vibhajissāmi, taṁ suṇātha sādhukaṁ manasikarotha, bhāsissāmī’’ti evamādinā
anya-e0903n1:11: Pucchā – pañcaverabhayasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:12_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ ārabbha ‘‘yato kho gahapati
anya-e0903n1:12_1: ariyasāvakassa pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti, catūhi ca sotāpattiyaṅgehi
anya-e0903n1:12_2: samannāgato hoti, ariyo cassa ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho, so ākaṅkhamāno
anya-e0903n1:12_3: attanāva attānaṁ byākareyya khīṇanirayomi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto,
anya-e0903n1:12_4: sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano’’ti evaṁ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:13: Pucchā – kathañcāvusotattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakassa pañcannaṁ bhayānaṁ verānaṁ vūpasantatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n1:14_0: Vissajjanā – ‘‘katamāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti. Yaṁ gahapati pāṇātipātī
anya-e0903n1:14_1: pāṇātipātapaccayā diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati, samparāyikampi bhayaṁ
anya-e0903n1:14_2: veraṁ pasavati, cetasikampi dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedayati. Pāṇātipātā ṭiviratassa
anya-e0903n1:14_3: evaṁ taṁ bhayaṁ veraṁ vūpasantaṁ hotī’’ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakassa
anya-e0903n1:15: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakassa catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgatatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n1:16_0: Vissajjanā – katamehi catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti. Idha gahapati ariyasāvako
anya-e0903n1:16_1: buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti ‘‘itipiso bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno
anya-e0903n1:16_2: sugato lokavidū anuttaropurisadammasārathi satthādevamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’’ti
anya-e0903n1:16_3: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakassa catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgatatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n1:17: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakena ariyassa ñāyassa paññāya sudiṭṭhatā suppaṭividdhatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n1:18_0: Vissajjanā – katamo cassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho. Idha gahapati
anya-e0903n1:18_1: ariyasāvako paṭiccasamuppādaññeva sādhukaṁ yoniso manasi karoti ‘‘iti imasmiṁ sati
anya-e0903n1:18_2: idaṁ hoti, imasmiṁ asati idaṁ na hoti, imassuppādā idaṁ uppajjati, imassa nirodhā
anya-e0903n1:18_3: idaṁ nirujjhati, yadidaṁ avijjāpaccayā (peyyāla) evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa
anya-e0903n1:18_4: nirodho hotī’’ti, evaṁ kho bhante bhagavatā tattha ariyasāvakena ariyassa ñāyassa
anya-e0903n1:19_0: Yato kho gahapati ariyasāvakassa imāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti. Imehi
anya-e0903n1:19_1: catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti. Ayañcassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho–
anya-e0903n1:21: Pucchā – dukkhasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:22: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘dukkhassa bhikkhave samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:23: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā dukkhasamudayo pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:24_0: Vissajjanā – katamo ca bhikkhave dukkhassa samudayo. Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati
anya-e0903n1:24_1: cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā.
anya-e0903n1:24_2: Ayaṁ kho bhikkhave dukkhassa samudayo. Sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṁ…pe…
anya-e0903n1:24_3: ghānañca paṭicca gandhe ca…pe… jivhañca paṭicca rase ca…pe… kāyañca paṭicca phoṭṭhabbe
anya-e0903n1:24_4: ca…pe… manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā
anya-e0903n1:24_5: vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā. Ayaṁ kho bhikkhave dukkhassa samudayoti evaṁkho bhante
anya-e0903n1:25: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā dukkhassa atthaṅgamo pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:26_0: Vissajjanā – katamo ca bhikkhave dukkhassa atthaṅgamo. Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca
anya-e0903n1:26_1: uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā
anya-e0903n1:26_2: taṇhā, tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodhā upādānanirodho upādānanirodhā bhavanirodho,
anya-e0903n1:26_4: nirujjhanti. Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotīti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0903n1:28: Pucchā – puttamaṁsūpamasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:29_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule adhunā pabbajite bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:29_1: Bhagavato ca bhante bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahālābhasakkāro udapādi, ekacce ca bhante
anya-e0903n1:29_2: bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā kulaputtā āhāraṁ apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjiṁsu. Tasmiṁ
anya-e0903n1:29_3: bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘cattārome bhikkhave āhārā bhūtānaṁ vā sattānaṁ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṁ
anya-e0903n1:29_4: vā anuggahāya. Katame cattāro kabaḷīkāro āhāro oḷāriko vā sukhumo vā phasso dutiyo
anya-e0903n1:29_5: manosañcetanā tatiyā viññāṇaṁ catuttha’’nti evaṁ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:30: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha kabaḷīkārassa āhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro bhagavatā pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:31_0: Vissajjanā – seyyathāpi bhikkhave dve jāyampatikā parittaṁ sambalaṁ ādāya kantāramaggaṁ
anya-e0903n1:31_1: paṭipajjeyyuṁ. Tesamassa ekaputtako piyo manāpoti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0903n1:32: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā phassāhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:33_0: Vissajjanā – seyyathāpi bhikkhave gāvī niccammā kuṭṭaṁ ce nissāya tiṭṭheyya, ye kuṭṭanissitā
anya-e0903n1:33_1: pāṇā, te naṁ khādeyyuṁ. Rukkhaṁ ce nissāya tiṭṭheyya. Udakaṁ ce nissāya tiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0903n1:33_2: Ākāsaṁ ce nissāya tiṭṭheyya, ye ākāsanissitā pāṇā, te naṁ khādeyyunti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0903n1:33_3: tattha bhagavatā phassassa āhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro vitthāretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:34: Evameva khvāhaṁ bhikkhave phassāhāro daṭṭhabboti vadāmi.
anya-e0903n1:35: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā manosañcetanāhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:36_0: Vissajjanā – seyyathāpi bhikkhave aṅgārakāsu sādhikaporisā puṇṇā aṅgārānaṁ vītaccikānaṁ
anya-e0903n1:36_1: vītadhūmānaṁ. Atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo sukha kāmo dukkhappaṭikūloti
anya-e0903n1:36_2: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā manosañcetanāhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro vitthārena pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:37: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā viññāṇāhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro pakāsito.
anya-e0903n1:38_0: Vissajjanā – seyyathāpi bhikkhave coraṁ āgucāriṁ gahetvā rañño dasseyyuṁ ‘‘ayaṁ te
anya-e0903n1:38_1: devacoro āgucārī, imassa yaṁ icchasi, taṁ daṇḍaṁ paṇehī’’ti evamādinā bhante tattha
anya-e0903n1:40: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena susimaparibbājaka suttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:41_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṁ susimaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā bhante susimo
anya-e0903n1:41_1: yāvatako bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ ahosi kathāsallāpo, taṁ sabbaṁ bhagavato ārocesi. Tasmiṁ
anya-e0903n1:41_2: vatthusmiṁ ‘‘pubbe kho susima dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṁ, pacchā nibbāne ñāṇa’’nti evamādinā
anya-e0903n1:42: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavā āyasmato susimattherassa sampatiarahattapattassa anuyogavasena paṭipucchitvā paṭipucchitvā uttari dhammadesanaṁ vitthāretvā desesi.
anya-e0903n1:43_0: Vissajjanā – jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti susima passasīti. Evaṁ bhante. Bhavapaccayā
anya-e0903n1:43_1: jātīti susima passasīti. Evaṁ bhanteti evamādinā bhante bhagavā tattha āyasmato susimassa
anya-e0903n1:43_2: sampatiarahattapattassa uttaripi anuyogavasena paṭipucchitvā paṭipucchitvā vitthārato dhammaṁ desesi.
anya-e0903n1:44: Tassa me bhante bhagavā accayaṁ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu āyatiṁsaṁvarāya–
anya-e0903n1:47: Pucchā – abhisamayasaṁyutte panāvuso paṭhamaṁ saṁgītaṁ nakhasikhāsuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:48_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘taṁ kiṁ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n1:48_1: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yo vāyaṁ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsuāropito, ayaṁ
anya-e0903n1:51: Pucchā – dhātusaṁyutte panāvuso caṅkamasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:52_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘dhātusova bhikkhave sattā
anya-e0903n1:52_1: saṁsandanti samenti, hīnādhimuttikā hīnādhimuttikehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samenti,
anya-e0903n1:52_2: kalyāṇādhimuttikā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samentī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:54: Pucchā – assaddhasaṁsandanasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:55_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘dhātusova bhikkhave sattā
anya-e0903n1:55_1: saṁsandanti samenti, assaddhā assaddhehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samenti, ahirikā ahirikehi
anya-e0903n1:55_2: saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samenti, anottappino. Appassutā. Kusītā. Muṭṭhassatino. Duppaññā
anya-e0903n1:55_3: duppaññehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samentī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:58: Pucchā – anamataggasaṁyutte āvuso dutiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ pathavīsuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:59_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘anamataggoyaṁ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n1:59_1: saṁsāro, pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ
anya-e0903n1:59_2: saṁsarataṁ. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso imaṁ mahāpathaviṁ kolaṭṭhimattaṁ kolaṭṭhimattaṁ
anya-e0903n1:59_3: mattikāguḷikaṁ karitvā nikkhipeyya ‘ayaṁ me piyā, tassa me pitu ayaṁ pitā’ti. Apariyādinnāva
anya-e0903n1:59_4: bhikkhave tassa purisassa pitupitaro assu. Athāyaṁ mahāpathavī parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ
anya-e0903n1:59_5: gaccheyya. Taṁ kissahetu, anamataggoyaṁ bhikkhave saṁsāro, pubbā koṭi na paññāyati
anya-e0903n1:59_6: avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhā saṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ’’ evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:60: Evaṁ dīgharattaṁ vo bhikkhave dukkhaṁ paccanubhūtaṁ tibbaṁ paccanubhūtaṁ byasanaṁ paccanubhūtaṁ kaṭasī vaḍḍhitā.
anya-e0903n1:64: Pucchā – tatthāvuso tatiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ assusuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:65_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahuleyeva bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘taṁ kiṁ maññatha
anya-e0903n1:65_1: bhikkhave, katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yaṁ vā vo iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvataṁ
anya-e0903n1:65_2: saṁsarataṁ amanāpasampayogā manāpavippayogā kandantānaṁ rodantānaṁ assu passannaṁ
anya-e0903n1:65_3: paggharitaṁ, yaṁ vā catūsu mahāsamuddesu udaka’’nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:67: Pucchā – tatthāvuso chaṭṭhaṁ saṁgītaṁ sāsapasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:68_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Aññataro bhante
anya-e0903n1:68_1: bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘kīvadīgho nu kho bhante kappo’’ti. Tasmiṁ bhante
anya-e0903n1:68_2: vatthusmiṁ ‘‘dīgho kho bhikkhu kappo, so na sukaro saṅkhātuṁ ettakāni vassāni itivā,
anya-e0903n1:68_3: (peyyāla) ettakāni vassasatasahassāni itivāti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:70: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena anamataggasaṁyutte gaṅgāsuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:71: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante aññataraṁ brāhmaṇaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Aññataro bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘kīva-
anya-e0903n1:72_0: Bahukā nu kho bho gotama kappā abbhatītā atikkantā’’ti. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ
anya-e0903n1:72_1: ‘‘bahukā kho brāhmaṇa kappā abbhatītā atikkantā, te na sukarā saṅkhātuṁ ‘ettakā kappā’
anya-e0903n1:72_2: iti vā ‘ettakāni kappasatāni’ iti vā ‘ettakāni kappasahassāni’ itivā ‘ettakāni kappasatasahassāni’
anya-e0903n1:72_3: iti vā’’ti eva mādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:74: Pucchā – puggalasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:75_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘anamataggoyaṁ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n1:75_1: saṁsāro, pubbākoṭi na paññāyati avijjā nīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ
anya-e0903n1:75_2: saṁsarataṁ. Ekapuggalassa bhikkhave kappaṁ sandhāvato saṁsarato siyā evaṁ mahā aṭṭhikaṅkalo
anya-e0903n1:75_3: aṭṭhipuñjo aṭṭhirāsi, yathā yaṁ vepullo pabbato. Sace saṁhārako assa, sambhatañca
anya-e0903n1:77: Pucchā – tatthāvuso duggatasuttañca sukhitasuttañca bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:78_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘anamataggoyaṁ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n1:78_1: saṁsāro, pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ
anya-e0903n1:78_2: saṁsarataṁ. Yaṁ bhikkhave passeyyātha duggataṁ durūpetaṁ, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ
anya-e0903n1:78_3: ‘amhehipi evarūpaṁ paccanubhūtaṁ iminā dīghena addhunā’ti, yaṁ bhikkhave passeyyātha
anya-e0903n1:79: Niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ, ‘‘amhehipi paccanubhūtaṁ iminā dīghena addhunā’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:81: Pucchā – tiṁsamattasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:82_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante tiṁsamatte pāveyyake bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘anamataggoyaṁ
anya-e0903n1:82_1: bhikkhave saṁsāro, pubbākoṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ
anya-e0903n1:82_2: sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ. Taṁ kiṁ maññatha bhikkhave, katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yaṁ
anya-e0903n1:82_3: vā vo iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ sīsacchinnānaṁ lohitaṁ passannaṁ
anya-e0903n1:82_4: paggharitaṁ, yaṁ vā catūsu mahāsamuddesu udaka’’nti evamādinā bhavagatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:84: Pucchā – mātusuttādīni panāvuso chasuttāni bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:85_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘anamataggoyaṁ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n1:85_1: saṁsāro, pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ
anya-e0903n1:85_2: saṁsarataṁ. Na so bhikkhave satto sulabharūpo, yo na mātābhūtapubbo iminā dīghena
anya-e0903n1:85_3: addhunā. Yo na pitābhūtapubbo. Yo na bhātābhūtapubbo. Yo na bhaginibhūtapubbo. Yo
anya-e0903n1:85_4: na puttabhūtapubbo. Yo na dhītābhūtapubbo iminā dīghena addhunā’’ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:88: Pucchā – kassapasaṁyutte panāvuso candūpamasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:89_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘candūpamā bhikkhave kulāni
anya-e0903n1:89_1: upasaṅkamatha apakasseva kāyaṁ apakassa cittaṁ niccanavakā kulesu appagabbhā. Seyyathāpi
anya-e0903n1:89_2: bhikkhave puriso jarudapānaṁ vā olokeyya pabbatavisamaṁ vā nadīviduggaṁ vā apakasseva
anya-e0903n1:89_3: kāyaṁ apakassa cittaṁ. Evameva kho bhikkhave candūpamā kulāni upasaṅkamatha apakasseva
anya-e0903n1:89_4: kāyaṁ apakassa cittaṁ niccanavakā kulesu appagabbhā’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:90: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha bhikkhave, kathaṁ rūpā bhikkhu arahati kulāni upasaṅkamituṁ.
anya-e0903n1:91: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā parisuddhāparisuddha dhammadesanaṁ dassetvā bhikkhūnaṁ ovādo dinno.
anya-e0903n1:92_0: Vissajjanā – ‘‘taṁ kiṁ maññatha bhikkhave, kathaṁ rūpassa bhikkhuno aparisuddhā dhammadesanā
anya-e0903n1:92_1: hoti, kathaṁ rūpassa bhikkhuno parisuddhā dhammadesanā hotī’’ti evamādinā parisuddhāparisuddhadhammadesanā
anya-e0903n1:92_2: vitthārato dassetvā ‘‘kassapena vā hi vo bhikkhave ovadissāmi yo vā panassa kassapasadiso,
anya-e0903n1:92_3: ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattāya paṭipajjitabba’’nti. Evaṁ kho bhante bhagavato bhikkhūnaṁ ovādo dinno.
anya-e0903n1:93: Yo hi koci bhikkhave bhikkhu evaṁcitto paresaṁ dhammaṁ deseti ‘‘aho vata me dhammaṁ suṇeyyuṁ, sutvā ca pana dhammaṁ pasīdeyyuṁ, pasannā ca me pasannākāraṁ kareyyuṁ–
anya-e0903n1:94: Svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehi passiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhi–
anya-e0903n1:95: Kassapena vā hi vo bhikkhave ovadissāmi yo vā panassa kassapasadiso, ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattāya paṭipajjitabbaṁ–
anya-e0903n1:97: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena kassapasaṁyutte catutthaṁ kulūpakasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:98_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘taṁ kiṁ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n1:98_1: kathaṁ rūpo bhikkhu arahati kulūpako hotuṁ, kathaṁ rūpo bhikkhu na arahati kulūpako
anya-e0903n1:99: Kassapena vā hi vo bhikkhave ovadissāmi yo vā panassa kassapasadiso, ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattāya paṭipajjitabbaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:101: Pucchā – tatthevāvuso bhagavatā dutiya ovādasuttaṁ kattha kena saddhiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:102_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmatā mahākassapena saddhiṁ ‘‘ovada kassapa bhikkhū,
anya-e0903n1:102_1: karohi kassapa bhikkhūnaṁ dhammiṁ kathaṁ, ahaṁ vā kassapa bhikkhū ovadeyyaṁ tvaṁ
anya-e0903n1:102_2: vā, ahaṁ vā bhikkhūnaṁ dhammiṁ kathaṁ kareyyaṁ tvaṁ vā’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:103: Yassa kassaci bhante saddhā natthi kusalesu dhammesu, hirī natthi. Ottappaṁ natthi. Vīriyaṁ natthi. Paññā natthi kusalesu dhammesu.
anya-e0903n1:105: Pucchā – tatthevāvuso bhagavatā tatiyaovādasuttaṁ kattha kena saddhiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:106_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmatāyeva mahākassapena saddhiṁ ‘‘ovada kassapa bhikkhū.
anya-e0903n1:106_1: Karohi kassapa bhikkhūnaṁ dhammiṁ kathaṁ, ahaṁ vā kassapa bhikkhū ovadeyyaṁ tvaṁ
anya-e0903n1:106_2: vā. Ahaṁ vā bhikkhūnaṁ dhammaṁ kathaṁ kareyyaṁ tvaṁ vā’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:107: Dubbacā kho bhante etarahi bhikkhū dovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgatā akkhamā appadakkhiṇaggāhino anusāsaniṁ–
anya-e0903n1:109: Pucchā – tatthevāvuso bhagavatā pariyosānaṁ saddhammappatirūpakasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:110_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁyeva mahākassapaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā
anya-e0903n1:110_1: bhante mahākassapo bhagavantaṁ etadevoca ‘‘ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo, yena
anya-e0903n1:110_2: pubbe appatarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni ahesuṁ, bahutarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahiṁsu.
anya-e0903n1:110_3: Ko pana bhante hetu ko paccayo, yenetarahi bahutarāni ceva sakkhāpadāni appatarā
anya-e0903n1:110_4: ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahantī’’ti. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘evañcetaṁ kassapa hoti
anya-e0903n1:110_5: sattesu hāyamānesu saddhamme antaradhāyamāne bahutarāniceva sikkhāpadāni honti, appatarāca
anya-e0903n1:110_6: bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahantī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:113: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena lābhasakkāraṁyutte pañcamaṁ saṁgītaṁ mīḷhakasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:114_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko
anya-e0903n1:114_1: pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave mīḷhakā
anya-e0903n1:114_2: gūthādī gūthapūrā puṇṇā gūthassa, purato cassa mahāgūthapuñjo, sā tena aññā mīḷhakā
anya-e0903n1:114_3: atimaññeyya ‘‘ahamhi gūthādī gūthapūrā puṇṇā gūthassa, purato ca myāyaṁ mahāgūthapuñjo’’ti
anya-e0903n1:115: Taṁ hi tassa bhikkhave moghapurisassa hoti dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya.
anya-e0903n1:117_0: Tasmātiha bhikkhave evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ, ‘‘uppannaṁ lābhasakkārasi lokaṁ pajahissāma,
anya-e0903n1:117_1: na ca no uppanno lābhasakkārasiloko cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassabhī’’ti, evañhi kho bhikkhave sikkhitabbaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:119: Pucchā – tattho āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakehi saṁgītaṁ ekaputtakasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbhaṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:120_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko
anya-e0903n1:120_1: kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya, saddhā bhikkhave
anya-e0903n1:120_2: upāsikā ekaputtakaṁ piyaṁ manāpaṁ evaṁ sammāāyācamānā āyāceyya tādiso tāta bhavāhi,
anya-e0903n1:120_3: yādiso citto ca gahapati hatthako ca āḷavako’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:121: Esā bhikkhave tulā etaṁ pamāṇaṁ mama sāvakānaṁ upāsakānaṁ yadidaṁ citto ca gahapati hatthako ca āḷavako.
anya-e0903n1:122: Sace kho tvaṁ tāta agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajasi, tādiso tāta bhavāhi, yādisā sāriputtamoggallānā.
anya-e0903n1:123: Mā ca kho tvaṁ tāta sekhaṁ appattamānasaṁ lābhasakkārasiloko anupāpuṇātu–
anya-e0903n1:124: Evaṁ dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
anya-e0903n1:126: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāyakehi saṁgītaṁ ekadhītusuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:127_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘dāruṇo bhikkhave
anya-e0903n1:127_1: lābhasakkārasiloko kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
anya-e0903n1:127_2: Saddhā bhikkhave upāsikā ekaṁ dhītaraṁ piyaṁ manāpaṁ evaṁ sammā āyācamānā āyāceyya
anya-e0903n1:127_3: ‘tādisā ayye bhavāhi, yādisā khujjuttarā ca upāsikā veḷukaṇḍakiyā ca nandamātā’ti.
anya-e0903n1:127_4: Esā bhikkhave tulā etaṁ pamāṇaṁ mama sāvikānaṁ upāsikānaṁ, yadidaṁ khujjuttarā ca
anya-e0903n1:127_5: upāsikā veḷukaṇḍakiyā ca nandamātā’’ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:128: Sace kho tvaṁ ayye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajasi, bhādisā ayye bhavāhi, yādisā khemā ca bhikkhunī uppalavaṇṇā ca–
anya-e0903n1:131: Pucchā – rāhulasaṁyuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:132_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ rāhulaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā bhante
anya-e0903n1:132_1: rāhulo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘sādhu me bhante bhagavā saṁkhittena dhammaṁ desetu,
anya-e0903n1:132_2: yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyya’’nti,
anya-e0903n1:132_3: tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘taṁ kiṁ maññasi rāhula, cakkhuniccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vāti.
anya-e0903n1:132_4: Aniccaṁ bhante. Yaṁ panāniccaṁ, dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vāti. Dukkhaṁ bhante. Yaṁ panāniccaṁ
anya-e0903n1:132_5: dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ ‘etaṁ mama, eso hamasmi,
anya-e0903n1:132_6: eso me attā’ti. No hetaṁ bhante’’ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:135: Pucchā – lakkhaṇasaṁyutte panāvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakattherehi paṭhamaṁ saṁgītaṁ aṭṭhisuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:136_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṁ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṁ
anya-e0903n1:136_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavatā sammukhe āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ
anya-e0903n1:136_2: etadavoca ‘‘idhāyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṁ padese
anya-e0903n1:136_3: sitaṁ pātvākāsi, ko nu kho āvuso moggallāna hetu, ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā’’ti.
anya-e0903n1:136_4: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallāno ‘‘idhāhaṁ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ
anya-e0903n1:136_5: aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ’’ti evamādinā ārocesi. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ
anya-e0903n1:136_6: ‘‘cakkhubhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti, ñāṇabhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti,
anya-e0903n1:136_7: yatrahi nāma sāvako evarūpaṁ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṁ vā karissatī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:137: Acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho;
anya-e0903n1:140: Pucchā – tenāvuso jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena lakkhaṇasaṁyutte tatiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ piṇḍasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:141_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṁ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṁ
anya-e0903n1:141_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhaggavato sammukhe āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ
anya-e0903n1:141_2: etadavoca ‘‘idhāyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṁ padese
anya-e0903n1:141_3: sitaṁ pātvākāsi , ko nukho āvuso moggallānahetu, ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā’’ti.
anya-e0903n1:141_4: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallāno ‘‘idhāhaṁ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ
anya-e0903n1:141_5: maṁsapiṇḍaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ, tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā
anya-e0903n1:141_6: vitacchenti virājenti. Sā sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karotī’’ti evamādinā ārocesi. Tasmiṁ bhante
anya-e0903n1:141_7: vatthusmiṁ ‘‘cakkhubhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti, ñāṇabhūtā vata bhikkhave
anya-e0903n1:141_8: sāvakā viharanti, yatrahi nāma sāvako evarūpaṁ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṁ vā
anya-e0903n1:143: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakehi mahātherehi saṁgītaṁ asilomasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:144_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṁ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṁ
anya-e0903n1:144_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavato sammukhe āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ
anya-e0903n1:144_2: etadavoca ‘‘ko nu kho āvuso moggallāna hetu, ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā’’ti.
anya-e0903n1:144_3: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallānatthero ‘‘idhāhaṁ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto
anya-e0903n1:144_4: addasaṁ asilomaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ’’ti evamādinā ārocesi. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ
anya-e0903n1:144_5: cakkhubhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti, ñāṇabhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti.
anya-e0903n1:144_6: (Peyyāla) eso bhikkhave satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe sūkariko ahosī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:146: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi saṁgītaṁ sūcilomasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:147: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante rājagahe āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṁ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavato sammukhe tatheva avoca.
anya-e0903n1:148_0: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallāno tatheva ārocesi. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘cakkhubhūtā
anya-e0903n1:148_1: vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti, ñāṇabhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti, (peyyāla)
anya-e0903n1:148_2: eso bhikkhave satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe sūto ahosī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitā.
anya-e0903n1:150: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi saṁgītāni pāpabhikkhusuttādīni pañcasuttāni bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitāni.
anya-e0903n1:151_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṁ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṁ ārabbha
anya-e0903n1:151_1: bhāsitāni. Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavato sammukhe pubbe vuttanayeneva ārocesi.
anya-e0903n1:151_2: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallāno ‘‘idhāhaṁ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ
anya-e0903n1:151_3: bhikkhuṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ. Addasaṁ bhikkhuniṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ. Addasaṁ sikkhamānaṁ
anya-e0903n1:151_4: vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ. Addasaṁ sāmaṇeraṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ. Addasaṁ sāmaṇeriṁ vehāsaṁ
anya-e0903n1:151_5: gacchantiṁ. Tassā saṅghāṭipi ādittā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā, pattopi āditto sampajjalito
anya-e0903n1:151_6: sajotibhūto, kāyabandhanampi ādittaṁ sampajjalitaṁ sajotibhūtaṁ , kāyopi āditto sampajjalito
anya-e0903n1:151_7: sajotibhūto, sā sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karotī’’ti evamādinā ārocesi. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ
anya-e0903n1:151_8: ‘‘cakkhubhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti ñāṇabhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti.
anya-e0903n1:151_9: (Peyyāla). Eso bhikkhave bhikkhu kassapassasammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpabhikkhu
anya-e0903n1:151_10: ahosi. Esā bhikkhave bhikkhunī kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpabhikkhunī
anya-e0903n1:151_11: ahosi. Esā bhikkhave sikkhamānā kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpasikkhamānā
anya-e0903n1:151_12: ahosi. Eso bhikkhave sāmaṇero kassapassasammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpasāmaṇero ahosi.
anya-e0903n1:151_13: Esā bhikkhave sāmaṇerī kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpasāmaṇerī ahosī’’ti
anya-e0903n1:154: Pucchā – opammasaṁyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi saṁgītaṁ nakhasikhasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:155_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘taṁ kiṁ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n1:155_1: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yo cāyaṁ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito, yā cāyaṁ
anya-e0903n1:156: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha bhikkhave, katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ.
anya-e0903n1:159: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi saṁgītaṁ āṇisuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:160_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘bhūtapubbaṁ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n1:160_1: dasārahānaṁ ānako nāma mudiṅgo ahosi, tassa dasārahā ānake ghaṭite aññaṁ āṇiṁ odahiṁsu,
anya-e0903n1:160_2: ahu kho so bhikkhave samayo yaṁ ānakassa mudiṅgassa porāṇaṁ pokkharaphalakaṁ antaradhāyi
anya-e0903n1:163: Pucchā – bhikkhusaṁyutte āvuso bhagavatā navasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n1:164_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ navaṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Aññataro
anya-e0903n1:164_1: bhante navo bhikkhu pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vihāraṁ pavisitvā apposukko
anya-e0903n1:164_2: tuṇhībhūto saṅkasāyabhi, na bhikkhūnaṁ veyyāvaccaṁ karoti cīvarakārasamaye tasmiṁ
anya-e0903n1:164_3: bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘mā kho tumhe bhikkhave etassa bhikkhuno ujjhāyitthā eso kho bhikkhave
anya-e0903n1:164_4: bhikkhu catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhamma sukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī
anya-e0903n1:165: Ahampi kho bhante sakaṁ kiccaṁ karomi,
anya-e0903n1:166: Eso kho bhikkhave bhikkhu catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī –
anya-e0903n1:170: Dhāreti antimaṁ dehaṁ, jetvā māraṁ savāhiniṁ–
